outputs.output_descr: Strengthened national capacity for inclusive governance and coordination of AIDS responses and increased participation of civil society entities and people living with HIV in the design, implementation and evaluation of AIDS programmes; Policies and Programmes implemented through multi-stakeholder approaches to protect the human rights of people living with HIV, mitigate gender-related vulnerability and address the impact of AIDS on women and girls
donor_name: UNITED NATIONS EDUCATIONAL, SCIENTIFIC & CULTURAL ORGANIZAITON
GLOBAL FUND TO FIGHT AIDS, TUBERCULOSIS
Not for profit based in New York
